import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./form.css"; import * as yup from "yup"; let schema = yup.object().shape({ firstName: yup.string().required("İsim en az 2 karakter olmalıdır"), pizzaFormSize: yup.string().required("Required"), }); export default function Form(props) { const [form, setForm] = useState({ firstName: "", pizzaFormSize: "", }); const [disabled, setDisabled] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { schema.isValid(form).then((valid) => { setDisabled(!valid); }); }, [form]); const handleInputChange = (fieldName) => (event) => { const value = event.target.value; setForm({ ...form, [fieldName]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log("form", form); }; console.log("form", form); return (
